div.div: St. Norbert College vs. Grinnell College

tr.td: SNC wins toss, chooses to defer, Grinnell will receive.
Randy Hill kickoff 65 yards to the GC0, touchback.
Sam Poulos pass incomplete to Tj Schaid (Austin Arts).
Tj Schaid rush for 3 yards to the GC28 (Anthony Parker;Austin Arts).
Sam Poulos pass incomplete to Jacob Meixler.
Graham Fisher punt 48 yards to the SNC24, downed.
ST. NORBERT COLLEGE drive start at 13:58.
James Tringali pass complete to Joe Green for 2 yards to the SNC26 (Colton Feller;Kevin Hwang).
Tony Ledvina rush for 1 yard to the SNC27 (Tom Brinkman;David Ternes).
James Tringali pass complete to Joe Green for 5 yards to the SNC32 (Andrew Clark).
Kevin Krueger punt 57 yards to the GC11, downed.
Ba. Morrissette rush for 1 yard to the GC12 (Austin Williams;Tobias Cole).
PENALTY SNC offside 5 yards to the GC17.
Sam Poulos pass complete to Jacob Meixler for 3 yards to the GC20 (Tobias Cole).
Tj Schaid rush for loss of 1 yard to the GC19 (Tobias Cole;Pat Gradus).
Graham Fisher punt 34 yards to the SNC47, fair catch by Joe Green.

Sam Poulos pass incomplete to Dalton Davies.
